'Add Loan Status change to Modification Approved loanxmlstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & loanrefno & _ """><LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""MODIFICATION APPROVED"" EffectiveDate=""" & NOW() & """/></LOAN></NLS>"

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Deferred Payment -- When Field Changes NLSRefno = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") pymnts = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF4")
If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF4") = 0 THEN 'NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", true ELSE defpaymentsql = "Select next_pay = CASE" & chr(13) & _ "WHEN ls.principal_period IN ('MO') THEN dateadd(mm," & pymnts & ",dateadd(dd,ls.billing_cutoff*-1-la.days_past_due,la.next_billing_date)) " & chr(13) & _ "WHEN ls.principal_period IN ('SM','S4') THEN dateadd(mm," & pymnts & "/2,dateadd(dd,ls.billing_cutoff*-1-la.days_past_due,la.next_billing_date)) " & chr(13) & _ "WHEN ls.principal_period IN ('BW') THEN dateadd(ww," & pymnts & "*2,dateadd(dd,ls.billing_cutoff*-1-la.days_past_due,la.next_billing_date)) " & chr(13) & _ "END " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct la, loanacct_setup ls " & chr(13) & _ "Where la.acctrefno = ls.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "AND la.acctrefno = " & NLSRefno
new_def_pymnt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(defpaymentsql) NLSapp.SetField "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", new_def_pymnt
'NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", false ' NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", false ' NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(192,192,192), true
END if**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Submit for Approval" Script="harshipreason = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF2") modtext = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF1") begindate = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF23") enddate = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF24")
validatesubmitforapproval modtext,harshipreason,begindate, enddate
Sub validatesubmitforapproval (modtype,harship,begindt, enddt)
If Not harship = "Choose an Option" Then
If modtype = "SCRA" Then If begindt = "" or enddt = "" Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Begin and End date values cannot be empty for SCRA Modifications." & chr(13) & "Please enter Valid Dates and re-submit.") Exit Sub End if End if
If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Are you sure You want to Submit for Approval? ") Then NLSApp.SetField "TASK_STATUS", "SUBMITTED FOR APPROVAL" NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF34", false
NLSApp.Savescreen() NLSApp.MessageBox("Task Status Updated.") End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Please select a Hardship Reason to Submit.") End If End Sub"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

SCRIPTS.script:
**###Before Save###****###Before Save###****###Before Activate###** 'Before Activate 'NLSapp.SetToolTip "TASK_DETAIL_UDF2", "(*) indicates a short-term reason." taskrefno = NLSapp.GetField("TASK_REFNO") loanrefno = NLSapp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") Status = NLSapp.GetField("TASK_STATUS") Queue = NLSapp.GetField("TASK_WORK_QUEUE") currate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(7,2),current_interest_rate))+'%' from loanacct where acctrefno = " & NLSapp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO")) currpmt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT '$' + convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(9,2), next_payment_total_amount)) from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = " & NLSapp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO")) currUID = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() Modapprover = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("Select groupno from nlsgroupmembers where userno = " & currUID & " and groupno = " & SECURITY_GROUP_MODIFICATION_APPROVERS)
' currUIDAuth = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT CASE When userno IS NULL Then 'N' Else 'Y' End from nlsgroupmembers where groupno = 22 and userno in (" & currUID & " )")
' If currUIDAuth = "Y" Then ' NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE task_detail Set userdef04 = 'Approve/Deny' where task_refno = " & NLSApp.Getfield("TASK_REFNO")) ' Else ' NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE task_detail Set userdef04 = 'Submit' where task_refno = " & NLSApp.Getfield("TASK_REFNO")) ' End If
'SCRA Extension Notice prevscralookupsql = "select convert(int, count(t.NLS_refno)) from task t, task_detail td where t.task_refno = td.task_refno " & _ "and t.task_template_no = 7 and td.userdef01 = 'SCRA' and t.status_code_id = 100002 and t.NLS_refno = " & loanrefno modtype = NLSApp.GetField( "TASK_DETAIL_UDF1") If modtype = "SCRA" and Not NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(prevscralookupsql) = 0 and Status = "STARTED" Then NLSApp.Messagebox("NOTE!!! This Loan has previously approved SCRA Modification(s) and is a potential SCRA-Extension.") End If
'NLsApp.RefreshScreen
If NLSapp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF15") = "" Then NLSApp.SetField "TASK_DETAIL_UDF14", currate NLSApp.SetField "TASK_DETAIL_UDF23", left(NOW(),8) End If If NLSapp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF11") = "" Then NLSApp.SetField "TASK_DETAIL_UDF10", currpmt NLSApp.SetField "TASK_DETAIL_UDF12", left(NOW(),8) End If
'Set field colors for visibility NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF16", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF25", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(127,255,212), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF15", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF11", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF17", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF24", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF23", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF12", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF13", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(255,248,220), true NLSapp.SetFieldAttribute "TASK_DETAIL_UDF19", RGB(0,0,0), RGB(189,183,107), true
'Set Hide all fields except requester info 'NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF1", true 'NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF25", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF2", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF12", True NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF13", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF14", true NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF14", false NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF15", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF23", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF24", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF10", true NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF10", false NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF11", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF17", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF21", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF9", true NLSapp.HideFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF16", true NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF4", False NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF5", False NLSapp.EnableFields "TASK_DETAIL_UDF6", false

sub donotrun1() 'Build Comment NLSRefno = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") Status = NLSapp.GetField("TASK_STATUS") If len(NLSApp.GetField("TASK_COMPLETED")) > 0 Then completedt = CDate(NLSApp.GetField("TASK_COMPLETED")) End if
If completedt = datevalue(NOW()) Then 'Only run if Completed this day IF not (Status = "SUBMITTED") THEN 'Only run if not in Submitted status 'Hardship? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF1") = "UNCHECK" THEN hardyn = "NO" ELSE hardyn = "YES" End If
'Permanent? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF2") = "UNCHECK" THEN permyn = "NO" ELSE permyn = "YES" End If
'Settlment If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF8") = "UNCHECK" THEN sttlyn = "NO" ELSE sttlyn = "YES" End If
'Interest only? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF3") = "UNCHECK" THEN ioyn = "NO" ELSE ioyn = "YES" End If
'Deferred Payment? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF4") = "CHECK" THEN defyn = "Defer Payment Until " & CDate(NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF9")) & chr(13) End If
'Lowwer Payment? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF5") = "CHECK" THEN lowyn = chr(13) &"Lower Payment" & chr(13) & _ "Current payment: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF20") & chr(13) & _ "New payment: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF11") & chr(13) End If
'Principal Reduction? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF6") = "CHECK" THEN predyn = chr(13) &"Principal Reduction" & chr(13) & _ "Current Principal Amount: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF21") & chr(13) & _ "Requested Reduction: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF13") & chr(13) End If
'Interest Reduction? If NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF7") = "CHECK" THEN iredyn = chr(13) &"Interest Rate Reduction" & chr(13) & _ "Current Rate: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF22") & chr(13) & _ "Requested Rate: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF15") & chr(13) End If
newcmmntstrg = " LOAN MODIFICATION DETAILS" & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "LOAN NUMBER: " & NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") & chr(13) & _ "Request Completed Date: " & completedt & chr(13) & _ "Request Entered by: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_CREATED_BY") & chr(13) & _ "Mod Requested by: " & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF18") & chr(13) & _ "Hardship Claim (Y/N): " & hardyn & chr(13) & _ "Permanent (Y/N): " & permyn & chr(13) & _ "Settlement (Y/N): " & sttlyn & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ " Requested Modifications " & chr(13) & _ "Interest Only " & ioyn & chr(13) & _ defyn & _ lowyn & _ predyn & _ iredyn & _ chr(13) & _ "ADDITIONAL NOTES" & chr(13) & _ NLSApp.GetField("TASK_DETAIL_UDF16")
If( NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("The Information below will be submitted for approval." & chr(13) & "CONTINUE? (Y/N)" & chr(13) & chr(13) & newcmmntstrg) )Then
NLSapp.SaveScreen()
xmlstrng1 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & chr(13) & "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") & """>" & chr(13) & _ "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & newcmmntstrg & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""Modification Request""/>" & chr(13) & _ "</LOAN>" & chr(13) & "</NLS>"
ImportXML(xmlstrng1)
sqlrefno_lookup1 = "SELECT convert(varchar(10),max(task_refno)) FROM task WHERE NLS_refno = " & NLSRefno & " AND task_template_no = 2" new_task_refno1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(sqlrefno_lookup1)
xmlstrng2 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & chr(13) & "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ "<TASK UpdateFlag=""1"" TaskRefno=""" & new_task_refno1 & """ TaskTemplateName=""LOAN MODIFICATION"" StatusCodeName=""SUBMITTED"" NLSRefno=""" & _ NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") & """ />" & chr(13) & "</NLS>"
ImportXML(xmlstrng2)
'Create Approval Task 'If current_work_packet_refno > 0 THEN SET CurrentTask = NLSApp.Tasks.Open(current_task_refno) Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(3) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.WorkPacketRefno = current_work_packet_refno Task.StatusCodeID = 3 Task.NLSRefno = NLSRefno If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Messagebox("Approval task Creation Error") NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction sqlrefno_lookup2 = "SELECT convert(varchar(10),max(task_refno)) FROM task WHERE NLS_refno = " & NLSRefno & " AND task_template_no = 3" new_task_refno2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(sqlrefno_lookup2)
xmlstrng3 = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?>" & chr(13) & "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <TASK UpdateFlag=""1"" TaskRefno=""" & new_task_refno2 & """ >" & chr(13) & _ " <TASKDETAIL TaskDetail1=""LOAN MODIFICATION"" TaskDetail2=""" & newcmmntstrg & """ />" & chr(13) & _ " </TASK>" & chr(13) & "</NLS>" 'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng3)
ImportXML(xmlstrng3) NLSApp.MessageBox("Approval task Created Successfully") End if Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Submission Cancelled.") End if End if End If End sub**###After Create###****###On Add Button Clicked###****###On Add Button Clicked###****###Local Functions###**Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("Payment Added") ImportXML = "" End If End Function
